herosection.title: Our mission is to empower individuals with the skills and knowledge needed to thrive in the digital age.

aboutsection.title: Welcome to PRO UNITY
aboutsection.text: Located in Bukhara, Uzbekistan, PRO UNITY is an innovative IT company specializing in software development and IT education. Our mission is to empower individuals with the skills and knowledge needed to thrive in the digital age.

blogSection.title: Watch Our blogs here
blogSection.text: Stay up to date with the latest news and developments in the world of software development by visiting our blog. We cover everything from beginner tutorials to advanced techniques, so there's something for everyone.

cardservice1.title: Software Development
cardservice1.Description: At PRO UNITY, we are dedicated to creating cutting-edge software solutions for businesses and individuals. Our team of experienced developers specializes in mobile applications, web development, and more. We utilize a variety of technologies, including Javascript, React, React Native, Flutter, Ionic, Java, Pyhton, Django, and more.

cardservice2.title: IT School
cardservice2.Description: In addition to our software development services, we also operate an IT school where we provide comprehensive training in coding and programming. Our goal is to equip our students with the tools they need to succeed in the ever-evolving tech industry.

cardservice3.title: Authorized Tutorials
cardservice3.Description: In addition to our coding and programming courses, we also offer authorized video courses on IT and design education. These courses are designed to provide individuals with the knowledge and skills needed to excel in the industry. Our expert instructors deliver high-quality content that is easy to understand and follow, ensuring that our students receive the best possible education.

cardservice4.title: Coworking
cardservice4.Description: Our co-working space is small yet convenient, providing a comfortable environment for our team to work and collaborate. We also offer authorized tutorials on IT and design education to help individuals expand their knowledge and skills.

cardservice5.title: Open Source
cardservice5.Description: We are proud to offer our own open source framework that includes essential components for UI and frontend work. This framework is the result of our dedication to innovation and collaboration within the developer community Our team of experienced developers specializes in mobile applications, web development, and more.

cardservice6.title: Pro Community
cardservice6.Description: At PRO UNITY, we are proud to be a part of the community, consisting of many developers and startups from Bukhara. Join us in our mission to create innovative solutions and push the boundaries of technology..

products.title: Our Products
products.desciption: Welcome to the ProUnity company's products page! Explore our range of products and discover tailored solutions designed to meet the demands and inquiries of anyone. Navigate through our page to find our top-notch products and get acquainted with the latest features and advantages consistently integrated into our solutions.

product-hrms.title: Hrms
product-hrms.description: Elevate your organizational efficiency with our cutting-edge HRMS application. Streamline HR processes, empower your workforce, and embrace a new era of seamless management. Explore the future of workforce optimization with our innovative solution.

product-delivery.title: Deivery
product-delivery.description: Hello there! Experience lightning-fast, hassle-free, and reliable delivery with our services. Whether it's gourmet meals, special orders, or anything in between, we ensure prompt and trustworthy delivery to your doorstep. Place an order now and start enjoying the convenience! 🚚🌟

product-chat-app.title: Chat
product-chat-app.description: Chat is a free, feature-rich platform designed to facilitate easy and meaningful communication with friends and acquaintances worldwide. This sophisticated chat and messaging platform empower users to connect across borders, cultures, and boundaries.

product-clinic-app.title: Clinic
product-clinic-app.description: Our clinic app is a free, feature-rich platform designed to facilitate easy and meaningful communication with patients and medical staff worldwide. This sophisticated messaging and communication tool empowers users to connect seamlessly across borders, cultures, and boundaries, enhancing the efficiency and effectiveness of healthcare interactions.

product-todo.title: Todo
product-todo.description: Todo - is a smart application for easy and convenient task management. Organize your daily tasks, set deadlines, and never forget to complete them. Todo offers a simple and efficient solution for managing your actions effortlessly.

product-spa-app.title: SPA
product-spa-app.description: HarmonyHaven: Empowering Global Wellness through Seamless Spa Communication and Connection.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.text:
This Website collects some Personal Data from its Users.

Owner and Data Controller

Islom Karimov 1 Street, Bukhara, Uzbekistan , +998 33 899 50 00
Uzbekistan Owner contact email: prounity.uz@gmail.com

Types of Data collected

Among the types of Personal Data that this Website collects, by itself or through third parties, there are: Cookies; Usage Data; first name; last name; email address; website.

Complete details on each type of Personal Data collected are provided in the dedicated sections of this privacy policy or by specific explanation texts displayed prior to the Data collection. Personal Data may be freely provided by the User, or, in case of Usage Data, collected automatically when using this Website. Unless specified otherwise, all Data requested by this Website is mandatory and failure to provide this Data may make it impossible for this Website to provide its services. In cases where this Website specifically states that some Data is not mandatory, Users are free not to communicate this Data without consequences to the availability or the functioning of the Service. Users who are uncertain about which Personal Data is mandatory are welcome to contact the Owner.

Any use of Cookies – or of other tracking tools – by this Website or by the owners of third-party services used by this Website serves the purpose of providing the Service required by the User, in addition to any other purposes described in the present document and in the Cookie Policy, if available.

Users are responsible for any third-party Personal Data obtained, published or shared through this Website and confirm that they have the third party’s consent to provide the Data to the Owner.

Mode and place of processing the Data

The Owner takes appropriate security measures to prevent unauthorized access, disclosure, modification, or unauthorized destruction of the Data. The Data processing is carried out using computers and/or IT enabled tools, following organizational procedures and modes strictly related to the purposes indicated. In addition to the Owner, in some cases, the Data may be accessible to certain types of persons in charge, involved with the operation of this Website (administration, sales, marketing, legal, system administration) or external parties (such as third-party technical service providers, mail carriers, hosting providers, IT companies, communications agencies) appointed, if necessary, as Data Processors by the Owner. The updated list of these parties may be requested from the Owner at any time.

Advertise.title: Advertise
Advertise.text:
ProUnity is dedicated to provide high quality content that is completely free of charge for its readers. With over half a million active users every month, ProUnity is a great place to advertise to a wonderful international audience of web designers and developers!

As a potential sponsor, you hold the key to unlocking an extraordinary opportunity – the chance to introduce your brand to this brilliant audience. With an array of carefully crafted advertising options, we provide a platform where your message will genuinely connect with our audience.

Have a look at our banner ads that you can purchase via our ad management platform. Below you can find all other sponsorship options. If you have any questions or would like to book one, get in touch with us via email or connect to our dedicated ad sales team via this form:

home.title: All-In-One HR platform to manage your entire employee experience
home.description: Elevate your organizational efficiency with our cutting-edge HRMS application. Streamline HR processes, empower your workforce, and embrace a new era of seamless management. Explore the future of workforce optimization with our innovative solution.

box1.title: Discover Our Story: Revolutionizing HR Management for Success
box1.description: At Pro Unity, we embark on a journey of transforming traditional HR management into a dynamic and efficient process. Founded with a vision to empower businesses through innovative technology, we have dedicated ourselves to creating an HRMS solution that caters to the evolving needs of modern enterprises.
box1.description2: Our commitment goes beyond just providing a software solution. We believe in fostering a collaborative environment, where businesses thrive and employees excel. With a focus on simplicity, automation, and adaptability, our HRMS platform is designed to seamlessly integrate into your workflow, allowing you to focus on what truly matters - the growth of your business.
box1.description3: As we continue to evolve, our mission remains clear: to be the catalyst for positive change in HR management. Join us in redefining the future of your business with a personalized and powerful HRMS experience. Your success is our motivation.

home.title: Fast, Convenient, and Reliable: Elevate Your Delivery Experience with Us
home.description: Hello there! Experience lightning-fast, hassle-free, and reliable delivery with our services. Whether it's gourmet meals, special orders, or anything in between, we ensure prompt and trustworthy delivery to your doorstep. Place an order now and start enjoying the convenience! 🚚🌟

box1.title: Effortless Delivery: Streamlining Logistics for Your Success
box1.description: At Delivary, we redefine the logistics landscape by providing a seamless and efficient delivery solution tailored to meet the unique needs of your business. Our commitment is to elevate your delivery processes, ensuring reliability, speed, and customer satisfaction.
box1.description2: Our cutting-edge technology empowers you with real-time tracking, smart route optimization, and robust analytics, giving you unparalleled control and insights into your delivery operations. Delivary is not just a delivery service; it's a strategic partner in your business growth.
box1.description3: Experience the ease of logistics management with Delivary. From doorstep to destination, we are dedicated to ensuring your deliveries are prompt, precise, and hassle-free. Join us in simplifying the way you deliver success.

home.title: Chat - Seamless Chat and Messaging Platform
home.description: Chat is a free, feature-rich platform designed to facilitate easy and meaningful communication with friends and acquaintances worldwide. This sophisticated chat and messaging platform empower users to connect across borders, cultures, and boundaries.

box1.title: Chat - The Ultimate Platform for Connecting Worldwide
box1.description: Chat is a product designed for connecting globally, finding new friends, and engaging in regular discussions. Our chat platform offers you an easy, private, and effective way to communicate. With enhanced features like anonymity and multimedia sharing, Chat is your ideal choice for managing your communication experiences.
box1.description2: Chat is an intelligently crafted chat platform for connecting with friends, sharing multimedia, and engaging in conversations. Designed to prioritize anonymity and privacy, Chat enhances your communication experience globally. It's the perfect choice for discovering new friends, creating global connections, and sharing special multimedia messages.
box1.description3: Chat is a product dedicated to fostering social connections, creating regular discussions, and sharing multimedia messages. Privacy and anonymity are paramount in our design. Chat provides you with the most convenient and effective ways to connect globally. Expand your friend circle and make global connections with ChatApp - your best choice.

home.title: Revolutionize Your Health with Our Cutting-Edge Clinic App: Empowering Wellness, One Click at a Time
home.title2: introducing our clinic app - the ultimate tool for managing your healthcare needs! Our app is designed to make it easy for patients to find and schedule appointments with their preferred doctors. With separate roles for patients and doctors, our app is user-friendly and efficient.
home.description: Patients can choose a doctor from categories and apply for an appointment, making it easy to find a doctor that suits their needs. Our availability calendar for doctors is a great way for patients to see when their preferred doctor is available and plan their appointment accordingly.
home.description2: Our clinic app is a reliable and efficient way to manage your healthcare needs. With features like appointment scheduling, doctor availability calendars, and categories for doctors, our app is the perfect tool for patients looking for a convenient way to manage their healthcare. Download our app today and experience the convenience of managing your healthcare needs at your fingertips!

about.description: Patients can choose a doctor from categories and apply for an appointment, making it easy to find a doctor that suits their needs. Our availability calendar for doctors is a great way for patients to see when their preferred doctor is available and plan their appointment accordingly.
about.description2: Our clinic app is a reliable and efficient way to manage your healthcare needs. With features like appointment scheduling, doctor availability calendars, and categories for doctors, our app is the perfect tool for patients looking for a convenient way to manage their healthcare. Download our app today and experience the convenience of managing your healthcare needs at your fingertips!

home.title: Todo - Easy Task Organization at Your Fingertips
home.description: Todo is a smart application for easy and convenient task management. Organize your daily tasks, set deadlines, and never forget to complete them. Todo offers a simple and efficient solution for managing your actions effortlessly.

about.title: Todo - Your Personal Task Assistant
about.description: Meet Todo, your ultimate task companion. We understand that life can get busy, and staying on top of your tasks is crucial. Todo is designed to be your personal task assistant, helping you organize, prioritize, and accomplish your goals with ease. From simple to-do lists to complex project management, Todo adapts to your needs, ensuring a seamless and productive experience.
about.description2: Todo is all about making task management simple and straightforward. We believe in providing a clean and intuitive platform that allows you to focus on what matters most – your tasks. Whether you're a professional managing work projects or an individual handling personal goals, Todo is here to simplify your daily routine. Take control of your tasks effortlessly and enjoy a more organized and productive life with Todo.

home.title: Elevate Your Well-Being with Our Innovative Spa App: Empowering Wellness, One Touch Away
home.title2: Unveil the Next Generation of Wellness Management: Your Essential Spa App for Effortless Appointment Booking and Beyond!
home.description: Simplify Your Spa Experience: Effortlessly Choose Your Preferred Services and Schedule Appointments with Our Intuitive Category-Based System. With Our Spa Availability Calendar, Plan Your Visits with Precision and Ease.
home.description2: Embrace Wellness: Seamlessly Manage Your Spa Experience with Our Reliable and Efficient App. From Booking Appointments to Viewing Service Availability and Convenient Service Categories, Our App is Your Perfect Companion for Effortless Spa Management. Download Today and Elevate Your Spa Journey with Ease.

about.description: Empower Your Spa Choices: Effortlessly Select Your Preferred Services by Category and Book Appointments with Confidence.
about.description2: Experience Effortless Spa Management: Our App Offers Reliable and Efficient Solutions for Your Spa Needs. From Easy Appointment Scheduling to Accessing Spa Availability Calendars and Categorized Services, It's Your Ideal Tool for Convenient Spa Management. Download Today and Enjoy the Ease of Spa Care at Your Fingertips!

about.title: About Authentication:
about.description: Authentication is a cutting-edge solution designed to enhance the security of system access and safeguard sensitive information. Our product is crafted with a deep understanding of the modern digital landscape, where ensuring the authenticity of users is paramount.
about.description2: At Authentication, we believe in empowering businesses and individuals with robust tools to fortify their digital defenses. With a focus on user-friendly interfaces and seamless integration, our solution makes implementing strong authentication measures a straightforward process.
